name: Google Background Change
description:
Return to Google's background can be change.

It is work on "normal" search, "image" search, and homepage.
additional_info: 2013******** 05/22 Now, It only work on Search page 2012******** 11/25 Search Tools Update 11/23 Option added ( repeat or no-repeat ) 11/20 Options added (auto resize) (Thank for Madao Chan) 11/16 Something added (.tsf-p) 11/13 Options added 11/12 Something Update (#gbz,#center_col,#rhs_block...etc), and somthing more(Logo Fix)... 11/10 Something Update
